rules_text: As long as you control 2 or more anomalies this creature gets +3/+0 and can’t block. [i](cards with multiple card types are anomalies.)[/i]

OG_1:
As long as you control 3 or more anomalies, MV2 Anomulmutt gets +3/+0 and can’t block. (Anything with more than one card type is an anomaly.)
